notifications.fileNotSvg: The imported file must be an SVG

hints.thinning: The effect of pressure on the stroke's size.
hints.smoothing: How much to soften the stroke's edges.
hints.streamline: How much to streamline the stroke.
hints.simulatePressure: Whether to simulate pressure based on velocity.
hints.startTaper: Tapering options for the start of the line.
hints.endTaper: Tapering options for the end of the line.
hints.pollingRate: How many times per second a point can be added to a stroke.
hints.autoCrop: Automatically crop the saved SVG to the actual contents of the sketch
hints.hiddenTile: When creating a tile from the sketch, create it as hidden.
hints.importSvg: Path to an SVG to be added to the sketch.
hints.donations1: If you are enjoying this module, consider supporting it!
